availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Louisville, Kentucky, real estate agent. Kentucky native. Married to Lucy V. Chapman Kennedy in Louisville on June 5, 1856. Real estate agent in Louisville in 1860. Appointed notary public in Jefferson County, Kentucky, on November 27, 1860.

ab.bibl:
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Jefferson County, Louisville, Ward 7, p. 196.
Kentucky Marriage Records, Madison County Courthouse, Richmond, Kentucky, Jefferson County Marriages, Film #000482708, p. 183.
“The Late Ben. D. Kennedy,” Courier-Journal (Louisville, Ky.), December 10, 1883, p. 8.
KYR-0001-017-0062.
